body.section: Hierarchy OutpatientVisit is a kind of EncounterEvent

section.title: Description
section.p: One or more encounters at one site within a specified length of time.

stentry.p: A categorization of the outpatient visit, based on the services provided and/or the circumstances under which the visit occurred. Possible values include: Ambulatory, In-Hospital (i.e., an patient made an "outpatient" visit while concurrently being an inpatient), Day Surgery, Observation, Nursing Home, Day Hospitalization, etc.
